Contains an array of raw CPUID data.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$libcpuid.\+h$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Contains an array of raw CPUID data. 

This contains one \doxyref{cpu\+\_\+raw\+\_\+data\+\_\+t}{p.}{structcpu__raw__data__t} for each logical CPU.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
There is a hard limit of raw array\+: it is bounded by the logical\+\_\+cpu\+\_\+t type. In other words, the limit is 65536 logical CPUs in the system. 
\end{DoxyNote}

array of raw CPUID data \label{structcpu__raw__data__array__t_afcda9cdabd191b53137719accea9316b} 
\index{cpu\_raw\_data\_array\_t@{cpu\_raw\_data\_array\_t}!with\_affinity@{with\_affinity}}
\index{with\_affinity@{with\_affinity}!cpu\_raw\_data\_array\_t@{cpu\_raw\_data\_array\_t}}
\doxysubsubsection{with\_affinity}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily bool cpu\+\_\+raw\+\_\+data\+\_\+array\+\_\+t\+::with\+\_\+affinity}

Indicates if \doxyref{raw}{p.}{structcpu__raw__data__array__t_a0a0bda19633ffbb8c779d15f15f5a894} was obtained by using CPU affinity if false, \doxyref{raw}{p.}{structcpu__raw__data__array__t_a0a0bda19633ffbb8c779d15f15f5a894} contains a single data from an old dump (versions 0.\+5.\+1 and below). if true, \doxyref{raw}{p.}{structcpu__raw__data__array__t_a0a0bda19633ffbb8c779d15f15f5a894} contains data from a new dump (versions 0.\+6.\+0 and above). if true and if \doxyref{num\+\_\+raw}{p.}{structcpu__raw__data__array__t_a04defb81241588612f040b1063841c77} is 1, it indicates only one logical core was detected on the system.
